body:
Some package maintainers put `config.guess` and `config.sub` in places other than the top-level repo. This causes problems on Power systems, because subclasses of AutotoolsPackage do not update these files automatically when they are in nonstandard places.

I can submit a fix for this that recursively finds and updates those two files, but I wanted to see if anyone has any moral or philosophical objections first.
title: AutotoolsPackage should recursively update config.guess and config.sub
